__TOC__

* Contact: [ErikMeitner3]
* Brand: Lenovo/IBM
* Make : Thinkpad
* Model: T60 (8744-5BU)
* Website: http://www-307.ibm.com/pc/support/site.wss/quickPath.do?quickPathEntry=87445BU
* Details: T7200(2GHz), 1GB RAM, 120GB 5400rpm HD, 15.4in 1680x1050 LCD, 128MB ATI Radeon X1400, CDRW/DVDRW, 802.11n wireless, Bluetooth/Modem, 1Gb Ethernet, UltraNav, Secure chip, Fingerprint reader, 6c Li-Ion batt, requires WinXP Pro tax

=== Current Issues ===
* Xorg will only work with the FGLRX driver but the driver prevents suspend and hibernate from working.
